pages.text: Throughout the world, Sound Carvers set up camps to rest during their journeys.$(br) Sometimes at night, you can see a light deep in the forest, but as you approach, it dims. $(o)What is this light? Some sort of device?$()$(br) I was lucky enough to find one of these camps, but all that remained was an amethyst block encased in stone. I feel like it wasn't the only thing left there.
$(o)Maybe the amethyst was the source of the light, but it doesn't produce light...
